type used = Array<{| userId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, displayName: String, firstName: String, lastName: String, bio: String, experience: String, domain: String, userType: String, roles: String|} | Null> {"example": "[{\\\"userId\\\":1,\\\"displayName\\\":\\\"a\\\",\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"alee\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"paul\\\",\\\"bio\\\":\\\"abn\\\",\\\"experience\\\":\\\"10\\\",\\\"domain\\\":\\\"IT\\\",\\\"userType\\\":\\\"student\\\",\\\"roles\\\":\\\"yyy\\\"},{\\\"userId\\\":3,\\\"displayName\\\":\\\"b\\\",\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"alfge\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"jjul\\\",\\\"bio\\\":\\\"abn\\\",\\\"experience\\\":\\\"10\\\",\\\"domain\\\":\\\"IT\\\",\\\"userType\\\":\\\"student\\\",\\\"roles\\\":\\\"yyy\\\"},null]"}
